refnamediv.refpurpose: C interface function which returns the type of a variable on the stack

listitem.para: the position on the stack of the variable for which we want to know the type (input parameter)
the type (defined in the sci_types enum which you can find in stack-c.h) of the variable at position StackPos on the stack

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: C interface function which returns the type of a variable on the stack. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C interface function takes one input parameters and prints the integer corresponding to the type of the variable sent as parameter in the Scilab console.
